winning.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the winning person or thing is the one that wins or makes you win a competition or game
winning.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The winning design came from an architect in Glasgow.
winning.translation[0].definitions[1].de: making you very successful or likely to be successful
winning.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: As a business, they have found a winning formula.
winning.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a winning quality or way of doing something is one that makes other people like you
